steps.title: â€œTYâ€ is not typically a word that you'd speak out loud.
steps.content: â€œTYâ€ is not typically a word that you'd speak out loud. According to Influencer and Content Creator Aaron Makelky, the abbreviation â€œTYâ€ is not actually spoken out loud as it's own word when it's in a text or DM. It stands for the phrase "thank you," so if you were reading that text or DM out loud, you'd pronounce "TY" as "thank you."
